title: What age should you write your biography? - Quora

response.answer_text: You must make this decision yourself. Some writers will wait until they are quite mature and write an autobiography. Others will choose to write more than one memoirs that each focus on a unique aspect of the individual's life. For instance, a person may write a memoir about surviving a childhood trauma and then later in life write a second memoir that focuses on a different aspect of the person's life. For example the second book might be about the life in a specific profession. Ultimately, you need to assess what your reason is for writing this, and that answer should direct you toward the correct answer
You should write your autobiography when you feel ready. When you’ve lived and experienced enough things that you’d want in a story of your life. You determine when it’s time! :)
